product_name: Hugger Mugger Ultra Nature Collection Yoga Mat
long_description: The colorful Hugger Mugger Ultra Nature Collection yoga mat is made to withstand years of use with all types of yoga, Pilates and general exercise. PVC material provides great traction so you can go deep into poses; does not contain latex, phthalates or heavy metals. 0.25 in. thickness cushions your knees and elbows during your workout. Your yoga classmates will be envious of the attractive colorful pattern that was inspired by nature. Antimicrobial properties are built-in to help control odors; wash mat by hand with mild dish soap and water. Hugger Mugger Ultra Nature Collection mat rolls up compactly for easy transport.
short_description: The colorful Hugger Mugger Ultra Nature Collection yoga mat is made to withstand years of use with all types of yoga, Pilates and general exercise.
